name: valex
description: Valex is a voucher card API. The API is responsible for creating, reloading, activating, as well as processing purchases.

scripts.test: dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma db seed && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest --runInBand
scripts.test:int: dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma db seed && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest int --runInBand
scripts.build: npx tsc && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma db seed
scripts.dev:migrate: npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:seed: npm run dev:migrate && npx prisma db seed
scripts.ci:test: dotenv -e .env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest --runInBand

author: Arthur Akira Tatesawa
